com.mlt.task

Class TaskPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.task.Task
      • com.mlt.task.TaskPool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class TaskPool
extends Task
    A task that executes other tasks in a concurrent pool. If one of the tasks of the pool is indeterminate, then all are considered indeterminate.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
